name: hhcau
body: |- wceq(ccauold, cin(cfv(ccau, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(ccauold, cin(cfv(ccau, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn)))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ Cauchy =((Cau ` c0)⋂(~H[↦]ℕ))
⊣ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
⊣ c1 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(IndMet ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ccauold, cin(cfv(ccau, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn)))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))
